website_summaries.verdict: The House of Marley Liberate XLBT Bluetooth headphones deliver seriously powerful bass response in a reasonably balanced sound signature, but do little to separate themselves in a crowded field.
pros: Powerful audio performance with very strong, boosted bass and reasonably balanced highs
Audio cable with inline remote included
cons: Slightly uncomfortable for longer listening periods

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit!
customer_reviews.text: I only took delivery of this super product four hours ago. But my mind is already made up... what a BARGAIN at £69! Sound quality is exceptional – I'm into 'big' sounding music like The Cadillac Three, Brothers Osborne and Black Stone Cherry, and these mighty headphones really do the job. The sound is spacious, crystal clear and hard hitting, even when it's streamed from my iPhone. Bass response is nothing short of remarkable. YAY! Happy bunny here...
customer_reviews.author: Stuie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing. The quality of the headphone is very impressive. We were lucky and got them half price. It worth the investment. There is only one thing, if the volume is a bit high people around can hear it. I find that a little bit annoying. But I am really really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andreab

customer_reviews.title: great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very loud, great sound quality, but the bass feels like it's holding back, the build quality is really nice, and fits in well with my other House of Marley gear. The battery lasts a long time, one charge, eight hours later and the battery has 3 out of 4 bars. The blue tooth range was excellent, still working 3 rooms away. It was charged fully in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. S

customer_reviews.title: Sound excellent, reliabity is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphone no more than a month ago - Really pleased at the beginning: sound quality excellent and perfect noise cancellation. BUT, after not even a month the screws holding the actual headphones are moving, and every time I need to go out I need to screw them back in otherwise everything falls apart. - Definitely not worth the price paid. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Arhiman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really hoped these would be amazing as I like the brand but unfortunately they really are not worth money. Sound quality isnt good at all and there are other brands on amazon for the same price which are miles better.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Castle

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: No complaints on quality. Sound as with all marley headphones I have tried, is well above average. Well worth the money , if you care about quality/sound.
customer_reviews.author: J Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Very Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very very good product I'd never heard of House of Marley but watched reviews on YouTube I used these for about 2 months as my first blue tooth headphone and really love them I thought I would upgrade sold them on Ebay and bought Beats studio and Bose for the girlfriend we love them but I do miss these !! They take at least 4 hours listening to start to sound there best
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connects easily but no sound. Have tried repeatedly with different settings but to no avail. Even if connected by stereo cable, they dont work. I have reverted to my old clumsy cheap Bluetooth ones. Save your money and avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Af Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product, great sound, great battery life and so far nothing has broken. But it isn't for someone who wants to throw it around.
customer_reviews.author: mybudkhm

customer_reviews.title: No regrets - don't waste money on Beats when you can buy this
customer_reviews.text: That quality in that price! Got me. I'm quite audiophile my self, now I'm wondering why these aren't so popular like Beat's or Bosse. There is one 'but' - you have to get used to them ( basically to the grip that they do when equipped). No regrets money
customer_reviews.author: Mateusz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband after his first set broke. He was thrilled with them and uses them all the time. Money well spent! He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Douglas

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: A really good products! Very comfortable, I like the long lasting charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Sounds average at best.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. I wouldn’t purchase again though. Looks wise it’s great. Sound quality, for the price isn’t that great.
customer_reviews.author: Maclee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love them comfortable and light great sound one off the best I have had
customer_reviews.author: claudia cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones, i've had previous Marley headphones these are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: damon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its was good overall just one problem with it was because it was a used item
customer_reviews.author: Terron Fordjoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of headphones especially for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of headphones especially for the price I paid. I recommend these to anybody who likes strong clear bass.
customer_reviews.author: jm2000

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking headphones. Sound is amazing. The choice between cable and bluetooth is the best feature. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice bass but lack of highs and I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bass but lack of highs and I had to open them an put the battery in place becouse it was moving inside.
customer_reviews.author: tudor

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but broken already
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of headphones, however, after limited use, the screws that hold the ear cup to the head band have gone missing, making the headphones unusable after less than a year. Is there any way of sourcing these screws?
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: They'll mug you off
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones at first, awesome bass nice feel but then they went faulty after the 30 return policy and they are unable to help me at all, don't waste your money like myself, s***ty company, good product
customer_reviews.author: Tobogin

customer_reviews.title: No leads, microphone or charging. Stated only minor ...
customer_reviews.text: No leads, microphone or charging. Stated only minor cosmetic damage was correct. Should of stated headphones only, no instructions etc...
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Jones

customer_reviews.title: There are rivets that hold the earpiece to the head ...
customer_reviews.text: There are rivets that hold the earpiece to the head band. These are not strong enough for the job, they work loose over time and pop out detaching the earpiece from the headband .
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Ear cup falling off after 2 weeks, tiny screw came loose and is now lost so completely useless. Disappointing to see considering the length of care I went to look after these. Please send me one of the 8 black screws that hold the ear cups to the hinge and the appropriate tool to fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshed196

customer_reviews.title: These are very good headphones with great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very good headphones with great sound quality, long battery life, and good bluetooth range. However, as other reviews have said, the little screws that hold the joints together are too weak to support the weight of the headphones and overtime they will become loose or just fall out entirely (like mine have). Once they fall out completely, it is very difficult to put the headphones back together since it is basically in two or three hanging pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good until the screws holding the earpiece to the hinge fell out. Make sure you keep your receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Marley Liberate XLBT – Bluetooth Wireless Headphones, Foldable Over-Ear Design, Noise Isolating, Premium Sound 50mm Drivers, Integrated Mic, USB Charging, 12hrs Battery Life - Midnight
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:MidnightHouse of Marley Liberate XL Bluetooth Headphones - Midnight.

BOX CONTAINS
Headphones 
Optional Cable 
Charging Cable
Carry Case
feature_bullets: 12-HOUR BATTERY LIFE: Powered by an internal 12-hour lithium ion battery. When you need to recharge the quick charge technology will ensure you’re back to full power in no time!
SUPERIOR SOUND: Enjoy a truly impressive high-performance audio quality. The headphones are acoustically perfected and balanced with 50mm dynamic drivers which provide exceptional clarity
STATE-OF-THE-ART FEATURES: The Liberate XLBT can control features such as volume up/down, play/pause, fast forward/reverse and well as phone answer/end. Also included is a tangle free braided cable
COMPATIBILITY: The Liberate XLBT on ear headphones are equipped with a 3.5mm jack audio cable that allows you to connect to any headphone compatible device
HOUSE OF MARLEY: Built on the principles of superior quality, sustainability and commitment to charitable causes. Enhancing lives through great products, as well as supporting global re-forestry

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
